resources.string: "Given Circumstances - \n We have decided to postpone your payment due date by 30 days!!"
"Given Circumstances - \n We have decided to proactively waive off late fees on your last payment due!!"
"Given Circumstances - \n We are proposing to reduce APR on purchase transactions to 15% for next 30 days!!"
"Given Circumstances - \n We are proposing to increase the credit limit by $1000"
